Rule.Name: AccessModifierMustBeDeclared
Rule.Context: The {0} must have an access modifier.
Rule.Description: Validates that an access modifier is declared for an element.

Rule.Name: FieldsMustBePrivate
Rule.Context: Fields must be declared with private access. Use properties to expose fields.
Rule.Description: Validates that a field is declared with private access.

Rule.Name: FileMayOnlyContainASingleClass
Rule.Context: A C# document may only contain a single class at the root level unless all of the classes are partial and are of the same type.
Rule.Description: Validates that a C# document does not contain more than one class at the root level.

Rule.Name: FileMayOnlyContainASingleNamespace
Rule.Context: A C# document may only contain a single namespace.
Rule.Description: Validates that a C# document does not contain more than one namespace directive.

Rule.Name: CodeAnalysisSuppressionMustHaveJustification
Rule.Context: A Code Analysis suppression must contain a non-empty justification describing the reason for the suppression.
Rule.Description: Validates that a Code Analysis suppression contains a justifiction describing the reason for the suppression.

Rule.Name: DebugAssertMustProvideMessageText
Rule.Context: A call to Debug.Assert must provide a message in the second parameter describing the reason for the assert.
Rule.Description: Validates that calls to Debug.Assert provide a message in the second parameter describing the reason for the assert.

Rule.Name: DebugFailMustProvideMessageText
Rule.Context: A call to Debug.Fail must provide a message in the first parameter describing the reason for the failure.
Rule.Description: Validates that calls to Debug.Fail provide a message in the first parameter describing the reason for the failure.

Rule.Name: StatementMustNotUseUnnecessaryParenthesis
Rule.Description: Verifies that the code does not contain extra, unnecessary parenthesis.

Rule.Name: ArithmeticExpressionsMustDeclarePrecedence
Rule.Context: Insert parentheses within the arithmetic expression to declare the operator precedence.
Rule.Description: Verifies that the code does not rely on implied arithmetic operator precedence.

Rule.Name: ConditionalExpressionsMustDeclarePrecedence
Rule.Context: Insert parentheses within the conditional AND and OR expressions to declare the operator precedence.
Rule.Description: Verifies that the code does not rely on implied conditional operator precedence.

Rule.Name: RemoveDelegateParenthesisWhenPossible
Rule.Context: Remove the parentheses from the anonymous method, since the delegate's parameter list is empty.
Rule.Description: Verifies that parenthesis are removed from anonymous methods when there are no method parameters.

Rule.Name: AttributeConstructorMustNotUseUnnecessaryParenthesis
Rule.Context: The attribute constructor does not need parentheses, since its parameter list is empty.
Rule.Description: Verifies that parenthesis are removed from attribute constructors when there are no parameters.

Rule.Name: RemoveUnnecessaryCode
Rule.Context: The {0} should be removed as it is empty.
Rule.Description: Verifies that the code does not contain empty code elements.
